= OpenWRT =

  * Checkout Sources
  {{{
  svn co svn://svn.openwrt.org/openwrt/branches/8.09 kamikaze
  }}}
  * Edit & add to top of openwrt-source-dir/feeds.conf.default:
  {{{
  src-cpy afrimesh afrimesh-source-dir/package-scripts/openwrt
  }}}
  * Update Packages
  {{{
  cd kamikaze
  ./scripts/feeds update -a
  }}}


= Dependencies =

  * Run:
  {{{
  ./scripts/feeds install libjson
  ./scripts/feeds install batmand
  ./scripts/feeds install libnetsnmp
  ./scripts/feeds install curl
  }}}


= Configure Afrimesh =

  * Edit: afrimesh-source-dir/Makefile
  {{{
  KAMIKAZE=openwrt-source-dir
  }}}

= Build Packages = 

  * Configure OpenWRT:
  {{{
  cd openwrt-source-dir
  make menuconfig
  # select afrimesh under the Administration heading
  }}}
  
  * Build
  {{{
  make world
  }}}
